name: Elusive Mist
description: Dissolve into a dark mist, reducing your damage taken from players by 75% and granting you Major Expedition, increasing your Movement Speed by 30% for as long as you maintain the channel.  Entering this form removes and grants immunity to all disabling and immobilization effects, but you cannot be healed and your Recovery stats are disabled.
rawDescription:
Dissolve into a dark mist, reducing your damage taken from players by <<1>> and granting you <<2>>, increasing your Movement Speed by <<3>> for as long as you maintain the channel.

Entering this form removes and grants immunity to all disabling and immobilization effects, but you cannot be healed and your Recovery stats are disabled.
